name: Thrown Item Adjustments
description: Removes lock-on throw from grenades, proximity explosives, and a few other items. Remote and briefcase options as well.

options.name: Remote Explosives
options.tooltip: Turn off lock-on for throwing remote explosives

options.name: Briefcases - Faster throw
options.tooltip: Throw briefcases at the same speed as other thrown items, hits with more realistic impact force.

options.name: Briefcases - Extreme Knockback
options.tooltip: Throw briefcases at the same speed as other thrown items

options.name: Throw | Dot Reticle
options.tooltip: Changes the thrown object reticle into a dot
